content.rendered:
For over two decades people have trusted us to help them with their health problems. Mata Roop Rani organ Hospital is a multi specialty, state of the art, 80 bedded hospital which is now a preferred healthcare service provider for its patients. The hospital boasts of modular operation theaters, highly efficient neonatal and adult ICU, Luxurious labour delivery rooms, sophisticated emergency & trauma support center and an IVF center.

Our specialties include advanced Minimal Access, Bariatric and General Surgery, Gynaecology and Obstetrics, Gynae Minimal Access Surgery, Paediatric Care & tertiary care Newborn ICU, IVF, Urology and Endourology, Dialysis and Nephrology, Orthopaedics and Joint Replacement, Trauma and Emergency Care, General Medicine and Critical Care ICU, Plastic Surgery and Cosmetology, Eye and ENT

Upon arrival at the hospital, an “International Patient Relations Officer” is assigned to the patient during his/her stay in India. We offer services that take care of the patient’s medical, personal and logistical needs – right from meeting them at the airport and handling routine formalities up till his/her discharge.

The hospital is conveniently located on the main outer ring road in West Delhi providing a wide range of exclusive services to the international patients. Our staff ensures a pleasant and comfortable experience throughout their stay.

Rates will be charged as applicable to overseas patients.
